TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit IPAddress extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址。

span.span: Provides an Internet Protocol (IP) address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含位址的 IP 網路上的電腦。The class contains the address of a computer on an IP network. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何查詢伺服器以取得家族的位址和 IP 位址與它支援。The following code example shows how to query a server to obtain the family addresses and the IP addresses it supports. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CPP/ipaddress.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CS/ipaddress.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/VB/ipaddress.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the address specified as a array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會透過屬性設定為`address`。The is created with the property set to `address`. 如果長度`address`為 4，建構 IPv4 位址; 否則建構的範圍為 0 的 IPv6 位址。If the length of `address` is 4, constructs an IPv4 address; otherwise, an IPv6 address with a scope of 0 is constructed. 假設為以網路位元組順序的索引位置 0 中的第一個最重要的位元組陣列。The array is assumed to be in network byte order with the most significant byte first in index position 0.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 包含錯誤的 IP 位址。

span.span: contains a bad IP address.

span.span: The long value of the IP address.

param.span: 例如，位元組由大到小格式的 0x2414188f 值將為 IP 位址 "143.24.20.36"。

span.span: For example, the value 0x2414188f in big-endian format would be the IP address "143.24.20.36".

summary.span: 將值從主機位元組順序轉換為網路位元組順序。

span.span: Converts a value from host byte order to network byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: public static short HostToNetworkOrder (short host);
.method public static hidebysig int16 HostToNetworkOrder(int16 host) cil managed
Public Shared Function HostToNetworkOrder (host As Short) As Short
public: static short HostToNetworkOrder(short host);

param.name: host
param.span: 以主機位元組順序表示之要轉換的數字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in host byte order.

summary.span: 將短整數 (Short) 值從主機位元組順序轉換為網路位元組順序。

span.span: Converts a short value from host byte order to network byte order.

returns.span: 以網路位元組順序表示的短整數值。

span.span: A short value, expressed in network byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的電腦會使用不同的慣例來排序中的多位元組的整數值的位元組。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 某些電腦先放置最大顯著性位元組 （亦即位元組由大到小順序） 和其他人先放置最小顯著性位元組 （又稱為 little-endian 順序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要使用不同的位元組順序的電腦使用，會透過網路傳送的所有整數值會以網路位元組順序先具有最大顯著性位元組都傳送。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法會將轉換從主機網路所使用的位元組順序使用的位元組順序的主機系統所儲存的多位元組的整數值。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

.method public static hidebysig int32 HostToNetworkOrder(int32 host) cil managed
Public Shared Function HostToNetworkOrder (host As Integer) As Integer
public: static int HostToNetworkOrder(int host);

param.name: host
param.span: 以主機位元組順序表示之要轉換的數字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in host byte order.

summary.span: 將整數值從主機位元組順序轉換為網路位元組順序。

span.span: Converts an integer value from host byte order to network byte order.

returns.span: 以網路位元組順序表示的整數值。

span.span: An integer value, expressed in network byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的電腦會使用不同的慣例來排序中的多位元組的整數值的位元組。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 某些電腦先放置最大顯著性位元組 （亦即位元組由大到小順序） 和其他人先放置最小顯著性位元組 （又稱為 little-endian 順序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要使用不同的位元組順序的電腦使用，會透過網路傳送的所有整數值會以網路位元組順序先具有最大顯著性位元組都傳送。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法會將轉換從主機網路所使用的位元組順序使用的位元組順序的主機系統所儲存的多位元組的整數值。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the host to the byte order used by the network.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 { get; }
.property instance bool IsIPv4MappedToIPv6
Public ReadOnly Property IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 As Boolean
public: property bool IsIPv4MappedToIPv6 { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 IP 位址是否為對應 IPv4 的 IPv6 位址。

span.span: Gets whether the IP address is an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address.
Returns .

value.span: 如果 IP 位址是對應 IPv4 的 IPv6 位址，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the IP address is an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雙重堆疊通訊端一定需要 IPv6 位址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. IPv4 位址互動的功能需要使用 IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式讓 IPv6 只有應用程式進行通訊與 IPv4 節點必須代表任何 IPv4 位址。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式可讓以 IPv6 位址表示 IPv4 節點的 IPv4 位址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 位址會編碼為低位 32 位元的 IPv6 位址，高序位 96 位元會保留固定的前置詞 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. RFC 4291 中指定的 IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址的格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Teredo 位址是 IPv6 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32. Teredo 位址可透過一般的 DNS 名稱解析傳回或列舉為指派給本機介面的 IPv6 位址。Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會比較`address`至並傳回`true`如果兩個 IP 位址相同。The method compares `address` to and returns `true` if the two IP addresses are the same. 在 [IPv4]，方法會傳回`true`表單的任何 IP 位址 （其中 X、 Y 和 Z 位於範圍 0-255） 127.X.Y.Z，不只(127.0.0.1)。In the case of IPv4, that the method returns `true` for any IP address of the form 127.X.Y.Z (where X, Y, and Z are in the range 0-255), not just (127.0.0.1). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以判斷指定的位址是回送位址。The following code example uses the method to determine whether the specified address is a loopback address. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/CPP/isloopback.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/CS/isloopback.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.IsLoopback/VB/isloopback.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將 物件對應至 IPv4 位址。

span.span: Maps the object to an IPv4 address.
Returns .
An IPv4 address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雙重堆疊通訊端一定需要 IPv6 位址。Dual-stack sockets always require IPv6 addresses. IPv4 位址互動的功能需要使用 IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式讓 IPv6 只有應用程式進行通訊與 IPv4 節點必須代表任何 IPv4 位址。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式可讓以 IPv6 位址表示 IPv4 節點的 IPv4 位址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 位址會編碼為低位 32 位元的 IPv6 位址，高序位 96 位元會保留固定的前置詞 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. RFC 4291 中指定的 IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址的格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231). 如果您想要使用IPv4 位址從 IPv6 格式轉換成 IPv4 格式，您必須先確定您已取得 IPv4 位址。If you want to use to convert an IPv4 address from IPv6 format to IPv4 format, you must first ensure that you've got an IPv4 address. 呼叫，這會傳回`true`IP 位址是否原本 IPv4 IPv6，以寫入或`false`否則。Call , which will return `true` if the IP address is originally IPv4 written as IPv6, or `false` otherwise. 如果傳回`true`，使用進行轉換。If returns `true`, use to make the conversion.

IPv4 位址互動的功能需要使用 IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式。The ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format. IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式讓 IPv6 只有應用程式進行通訊與 IPv4 節點必須代表任何 IPv4 位址。Any IPv4 addresses must be represented in the IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format which enables an IPv6 only application to communicate with an IPv4 node. IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址格式可讓以 IPv6 位址表示 IPv4 節點的 IPv4 位址。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format allows the IPv4 address of an IPv4 node to be represented as an IPv6 address. IPv4 位址會編碼為低位 32 位元的 IPv6 位址，高序位 96 位元會保留固定的前置詞 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF。The IPv4 address is encoded into the low-order 32 bits of the IPv6 address, and the high-order 96 bits hold the fixed prefix 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF. RFC 4291 中指定的 IPv4 對應的 IPv6 位址的格式。The IPv4-mapped IPv6 address format is specified in RFC 4291. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231)。For more information, see [www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4291.txt](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=92231).

summary.span: 將數字從網路位元組順序轉換為主機位元組順序。

span.span: Converts a number from network byte order to host byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: public static short NetworkToHostOrder (short network);
.method public static hidebysig int16 NetworkToHostOrder(int16 network) cil managed
Public Shared Function NetworkToHostOrder (network As Short) As Short
public: static short NetworkToHostOrder(short network);

param.name: network
param.span: 以網路位元組順序表示之要轉換的數字。

span.span: The number to convert, expressed in network byte order.

summary.span: 將短整數值從網路位元組順序轉換為主機位元組順序。

span.span: Converts a short value from network byte order to host byte order.

returns.span: 以主機位元組順序表示的短整數值。

span.span: A short value, expressed in host byte order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的電腦會使用不同的慣例來排序中的多位元組的整數值的位元組。Different computers use different conventions for ordering the bytes within multibyte integer values. 某些電腦先放置最大顯著性位元組 （亦即位元組由大到小順序） 和其他人先放置最小顯著性位元組 （又稱為 little-endian 順序）。Some computers put the most significant byte first (known as big-endian order) and others put the least-significant byte first (known as little-endian order). 若要使用不同的位元組順序的電腦使用，會透過網路傳送的所有整數值會以網路位元組順序先具有最大顯著性位元組都傳送。To work with computers that use different byte ordering, all integer values that are sent over the network are sent in network byte order which has the most significant byte first. 方法會將轉換從主機所使用的位元組順序網路所使用的位元組順序的主機系統所儲存的多位元組的整數值。The method converts multibyte integer values that are stored on the host system from the byte order used by the network to the byte order used by the host. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以將網路位元組順序的短整數值轉換為主機位元組順序。The following example uses the method to convert a short value from network byte order to host byte order. [!code-cpp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CPP/ipaddress_networktohost.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CS/ipaddress_networktohost.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/VB/ipaddress_networktohost.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CPP/ipaddress_networktohost.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/CS/ipaddress_networktohost.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IPAddress_NetworkToHost#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IPAddress_NetworkToHost/VB/ipaddress_networktohost.vb#2)]

public: static System::Net::IPAddress ^ Parse(ReadOnlySpan<char> ipString);
public static System.Net.IPAddress Parse (string ipString);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.IPAddress Parse(string ipString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Parse (ipString As String) As IPAddress
public: static System::Net::IPAddress ^ Parse(System::String ^ ipString);

param.name: ipString
param.span: 字串，包含使用 IPv4 點分隔四組數字標記法和 IPv6 冒號分隔十六進位標記法的 IP 位址。

span.span: A string that contains an IP address in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 and in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6.

summary.span: 將 IP 位址字串轉換為 執行個體。

span.span: Converts an IP address string to an instance.
An instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態方法會建立來自 IP 位址和 IPv6 的冒號十六進位標記法中 ipv4 以點分隔四標記法來表示的執行個體。The static method creates an instance from an IP address expressed in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 and in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6. 中的部分數目 （以逗號分隔每個部分）`ipString`決定如何建構的 IP 位址。The number of parts (each part is separated by a period) in `ipString` determines how the IP address is constructed. 一個部分的位址是直接儲存在網路位址。A one part address is stored directly in the network address. 兩個部分的位址，為便於指定類別 A 位址，會將的前置部分放在第一個位元組和網路位址中最右邊的三個位元組的尾端部分。A two part address, convenient for specifying a class A address, puts the leading part in the first byte and the trailing part in the right-most three bytes of the network address. 三個部分的位址，為便於指定類別 B 位址，將第一個部分中的第一個位元組、 第二個部分中的第二個位元組和網路位址的最後一個部分中最右邊的兩個位元組。A three part address, convenient for specifying a class B address, puts the first part in the first byte, the second part in the second byte, and the final part in the right-most two bytes of the network address. 例如: For example: |組件和範例的數目 `ipString`Number of parts and example `ipString`|IPAddress 的 IPv4 位址IPv4 address for IPAddress| |--------------------------------------------|--------------------------------| |1 -- "65535"1 -- "65535"|0.0.255.2550.0.255.255| |2 -- "20.2"2 -- "20.2"|20.0.0.220.0.0.2| |2 -- "20.65535"2 -- "20.65535"|20.0.255.25520.0.255.255| |3 -- "128.1.2"3 -- "128.1.2"|128.1.0.2128.1.0.2| ## Examples 下列程式碼將會包含一個 IP 位址在點線四標記法中 ipv4 或 ipv6 的執行個體的冒號十六進位標記法的字串轉換類別。The following code converts a string that contains an IP address, in dotted-quad notation for IPv4 or in colon-hexadecimal notation for IPv6, into an instance of the class. 然後它會使用多載方法，以顯示在標準標記法的位址。Then it uses the overloaded method to display the address in standard notation. [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/CPP/parse.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/CS/parse.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress.Parse/VB/parse.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the IPv6 address scope identifier.

value.span: 指定位址範圍的長整數。

span.span: A long integer that specifies the scope of the address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 意義使用它的內容而有所不同。The meaning of changes depending on the context in which it is used. - 連結-本機位址。Link-local address. 在主機上具有多個介面連接到不同的連結，相同的連結-本機位址可以指派給多個介面。On a host with multiple interfaces connected to separate links, the same link-local address can be assigned to multiple interfaces. 若要消除此模稜兩可，範圍識別項用來指定哪些訊息交換的介面。To eliminate this ambiguity, a scope identifier is used to specify the interface over which messages are exchanged. > [!NOTE] > 連結-本機位址，格式首碼 (FP) FE80 所識別節點時使用的相同連結上的相鄰節點通訊。Link-local addresses, identified by the Format Prefix (FP) FE80, are used by nodes when communicating with neighboring nodes on the same link. - 網站-本機位址。Site-local addresses. 主機可以連接到多個站台。A host can be connected to multiple sites. 在此情況下，範圍識別項會表示特定站台彼此通訊。In this case, a scope identifier is used to indicate a specific site to communicate with. > [!NOTE] > 私人內部網路上通訊時，節點會使用格式首碼 (FP) FEC0 中，以識別的網站-本機位址。Site-local addresses, identified by the Format Prefix (FP) FEC0, are used by nodes when communicating on private intranets. 用來指定的標記法`ScopeId`的位址是`Address%ScopeId`。The notation that is used to specify the `ScopeId` with an address is `Address%ScopeId`. 例如：`FE80::5EFE:192.168.41.30%2.`For example, `FE80::5EFE:192.168.41.30%2.` ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CPP/ipaddress.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/CS/ipaddress.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPAddress#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPAddress/VB/ipaddress.vb#3)]

summary.span: 將網際網路位址轉換為其標準標記法。

span.span: Converts an Internet address to its standard notation.

returns.span: 字串，包含使用 IPv4 點分隔四組數字和 IPv6 冒號分隔十六進位之其中一種標記法的 IP 位址。

span.span: A string that contains the IP address in either IPv4 dotted-quad or in IPv6 colon-hexadecimal notation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將轉換的 IP 位址，儲存在IPv4 以點分隔四或 IPv6 冒號十六進位標記法的屬性。The method converts the IP address that is stored in the property to either IPv4 dotted-quad or IPv6 colon-hexadecimal notation.

exception.span: 位址家族是 ，而且位址是錯誤的。

span.span: The address family is and the address is bad.

The version of the string.

summary.span: 判斷字串是否為有效的 IP 位址。

span.span: Determines whether a string is a valid IP address.

returns.span: 如果 可以剖析為 IP 位址，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if was able to be parsed as an IP address; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，這個方法會接受為有效可以剖析為 ipString 值，，然後將該 Int64 視為以網路位元組順序，其方式類似於 IP 位址的長整數值，建構函式會。Note that this method accepts as valid an ipString value that can be parsed as an , and then treats that Int64 as the long value of an IP address in network byte order, similar to the way that the constructor does. 這表示此方法傳回如果 Int64 會剖析成功，則為 true，即使它代表不是有效的 IP 位址的位址。This means that this method returns true if the Int64 is parsed successfully, even if it represents an address that's not a valid IP address. 例如，如果 ipString"1"，這個方法會傳回 true 即使"1"（或 0.0.0.1） 不是有效的 IP 位址，以及您可能會希望此方法以傳回 false。For example, if ipString is "1", this method returns true even though "1" (or 0.0.0.1) is not a valid IP address and you might expect this method to return false. 修正這個 bug 會破壞現有的應用程式，因此不會變更目前的行為。Fixing this bug would break existing apps, so the current behavior will not be changed. 您的程式碼可以確保它只使用這個方法來剖析十進位格式的 IP 位址，以避免這種行為。Your code can avoid this behavior by ensuring that it only uses this method to parse IP addresses in dotted-decimal format.
